price: 56. Ma ku dhadhaminayaan (jannada) dhexdeeda dhimasho aan aheyn dhimashadii hore, wuxuuna (Alle) ka dhowray cadaabka Naarta Ololka badan.
arabic: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلۡمَوۡتَ إِلَّا ٱلۡمَوۡتَةَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰۖ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhā al-mawta illā al-mawtata al-ūlā wawaqāhum ʿadhāba al-jaḥīmi
